item.title: Red lines and increasing self-censorship reshape Hong Kong's once freewheeling press scene
item.description: Hong Kong's press freedom has dramatically declined over some 20 years, falling from 18th to 140th in a global press freedom index

item.title: Trump pushes a 1-year, 10% cap on credit card interest rates and banks balk
item.description: President Donald Trump says he wants a one-year, 10% cap on credit card interest rates

item.title: UN cites 'widespread repression' in Uganda before presidential election

item.title: GM hit with $6 billion in charges as EV incentives cut and emissions standards fade
item.description: General Motors will be hit with charges of about $6 billion in its fourth quarter after sales of electric vehicles sputtered when the U.S. cut tax inc...

item.title: Iran supreme leader signals crackdown coming on protesters
item.description: Iran's judiciary chief has vowed decisive punishment for protesters, signaling a coming crackdown against demonstrations
